title: Love in the Time of Zombies: Part One
description: This is the first novelette in the 'Love in the Time of Zombies' series by Everly Rivers. Immerse yourself in this post-apocalyptic world where survivors turn to love for an escape from the constant threat of danger.  For three years it's been just Lexie and her father. After his death, Lexie meets Alayne, a women traveling back to a large camp of survivors. Now traveling together, Lexie must decide whether to follow her heart or her gut.   **This eBook contains explicit descriptions of sexual situations and is not suitable for anyone under the age of 18**
author: Everly Rivers
